participant_1.background:
I learned that my best friend was lying to me about everything.
my hair is very long.
i go to a private high school.
my mother is a librarian.
i play drums in a band.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my knowledge of the Beatles' music and history.
i like to eat.
I'm going to take a break from my work on bitcoins and go hiking in the mountains.
I secretly want to be a professional athlete, but I know my parents would never approve.
i have a missing pinky toe.

content.text: Hi, I'm doing pretty well. Just wrapped up a lot of work, and now I'm taking a break to go hiking in the mountains.
That sounds really fun! I've never been hiking in the mountains before.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the fresh air.
I'll definitely have to put it on my list! What kind of music do you like?
I'm a big fan of the Beatles. They're my favorite band of all time.
Oh, I love the Beatles too! They're so great.
They really are. I know a lot about their music and history.
That's awesome! I'm not sure I know as much about them as you do.
I'd be happy to tell you more about them sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to learn more.
Awesome! Let's exchange numbers and we can set up a time to chat.
